entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
